introduction: Tansu is a decentralized governance platform operated by Consulting Manao GmbH, located in Austria. By using our dApp, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
importantNotice: Our architecture is fully decentralized—we do not operate backend servers or store user data. We recommend reading our Privacy Policy alongside these Terms.

keyPoints.title: Age Requirement
keyPoints.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services.

keyPoints.title: Free Service
keyPoints.content: Tansu is provided free of charge. Users only pay blockchain transaction fees.

keyPoints.title: Wallet Required
keyPoints.content: You must use a third-party Stellar wallet to authenticate your account.

keyPoints.title: Content Responsibility
keyPoints.content: You are solely responsible for all content you upload to IPFS.

keyPoints.title: Collateral System
keyPoints.content: Proposals and voting require collateral, reimbursed upon successful execution.

keyPoints.title: Austrian Law
keyPoints.content: These Terms are governed by Austrian law with jurisdiction in Graz, Austria.

importantRisks.title: Blockchain Risks
importantRisks.content: Transactions are permanent and cannot be reversed. Cryptocurrency prices fluctuate significantly.

importantRisks.title: IPFS Content
importantRisks.content: Content uploaded to IPFS is permanent and cannot be deleted. It remains accessible even if unlinked from our platform.

importantRisks.title: Anonymous Voting
importantRisks.content: Lost private keys prevent vote decryption and proposal execution. No recovery mechanism exists.

importantRisks.title: No Recourse
importantRisks.content: Lost keys, failed transactions, or errors cannot be reversed or compensated.

yourResponsibilities: Use services in compliance with Austrian law and these Terms
Secure your wallet and private keys
Provide accurate information when using our services
Ensure uploaded content complies with laws and doesn't infringe on others' rights
Do not upload illegal, harmful, or inappropriate content
Do not attempt to compromise platform security
Do not engage in fraudulent or deceptive practices

serviceModifications.administrativeRights: We may take administrative actions including project deletion, proposal cancellation, member suspension, and data corrections to enforce Terms, ensure security, or comply with legal requirements.

limitationsOfLiability: We do not guarantee continuous, uninterrupted access to our services
Our services depend on third-party systems beyond our control
We provide services "as is" without warranties of any kind
Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by Austrian law
